About Canada

Studying, travelling, working and immigrating to Canada can be a rewarding, life changing experience. The vast landscape of Canada offers diverse eco-systems and cultural communities. It contains charming small towns and vibrant big cities. It is one of the most welcoming, multi-cultural countries in the world with affordable health care and standard of living. According to Business Insider, Canada is rated in the top ten of desirable places to live.

From the Pacific to the Atlantic, there are so many interesting places to explore in Canada: the mountains of British Columbia, the national parks of Alberta, the prairies of Saskatchewan, the museums of Manitoba, the restaurants of Ontario, the charming architecture of Québec, the scenery of the Maritimes and much more! Why don't you explore the CN tower in the bustling city of Toronto, observe the power of the water of Niagara Falls, explore the West Edmonton mall, learn French in Montreal or catch lobster in Halifax? In Canada, there is so much to see, to experience, and enjoy!.

Canada is praised for the excellence of its higher education system, ranked 5th in the world, its accepting support of entrepreneurs and its low unemployment rate. It is truly a land of opportunity for people committed to study and work.
